question: Which country houses "Mount Entoto"?
explanation: Mount Entoto is the highest peak on the Entoto Mountains which is located in Addis Ababa, the capital city of Ethiopia. This mountain which is 3200 meters above sea level, is widely considered as the "Lungs of Addis Ababa". This mountain is densely covered by eucalyptus trees. This mountain is also a historical place in which Emporer Menelik II had his residential palace.
